lines.content: yoyo.ui.Yoyo is a Personal Assistant yoyo.ui.Chatbot designed to help users keep track of various tasks and activities.
This project aims to provide an intuitive and efficient way to manage your daily responsibilities.

Task result = parser.parse("event project meeting /from 2024-12-31 /to 2025-01-01", tasks);
